alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clark; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:19PM CDT until July 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 519 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Sparkman, or 17 miles south of Arkadelphia, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gurdon... Bearden... Sparkman... Harlow... Amy... Tates Bluff... Pine Grove... Dalark... Ouachita... Holly Springs... Vaden... Millville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
